LABEL: 0x337
STRING: Grabbed Reiri's hand.

LABEL: 0x3B4
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x3FA
STRING: I wasn't sure if she could hear me calling out to her or not.

LABEL: 0x432
STRING: Reiri stayed silent and just stared at the light with a terribly warped expression.

LABEL: 0x478
STRING: Why at a time like this...? Did she not get what was going on?!

LABEL: 0x4D0
STRING: 「Tch... Come on!」

LABEL: 0x4EE
STRING: As soon as I said that, I pulled her by the arm.

LABEL: 0x512
STRING: Her slender wrist was caught within my clenched hand.

LABEL: 0x548
STRING: I pulled her with all my might, and Reiri's body easily fell into my arms.

LABEL: 0x5F4
STRING: 「Hurry!」

LABEL: 0x611
STRING: 「Let's run!」

LABEL: 0x642
STRING: I dashed off without waiting for Reiri's reply.

LABEL: 0x676
STRING: I wondered if it was thanks to the ship's soundproofing that Yukari's voice sounded so far away.

LABEL: 0x6CB
STRING: For some reason, I couldn't help but think about inconsequential things like that at this moment.

LABEL: 0x729
STRING: I held Reiri in my arms so that she wouldn't fall behind.

LABEL: 0x763
STRING: Despite the rough treatment, she said nothing.

LABEL: 0x79F
STRING: Although she stiffened her body the moment I started to run, a moment later, she completely surrendered herself to me.

LABEL: 0x7F7
STRING: It was almost as if I was carrying a package, or a dead body.

LABEL: 0x845
STRING: ...What a ridiculous thought.

LABEL: 0x867
STRING: We weren't going to die in a place like this.

LABEL: 0x891
STRING: In order to prevent any more deaths, I would――

LABEL: 0x8D7
STRING: 「――The mystery of life.」

LABEL: 0x8FC
STRING: Her faraway whisper reached my ears terribly clearly.

LABEL: 0x99D
STRING: 「Tokiwa...?」

LABEL: 0x9BB
STRING: That was the voice of the girl wearing a kimono with an unmistakable design.

LABEL: 0x9ED
STRING: Her voice was very calm despite the situation.

LABEL: 0xA1D
STRING: ...Well, to say that this was typical of Tokiwa would be an understatement. She was always like this.

LABEL: 0xA6B
STRING: It wasn't like she was sick or anything.

LABEL: 0xA9F
STRING: Even though you could say there was something wrong with her head.

LABEL: 0xADF
STRING: But why did she lack the sense of danger and awareness people usually had...?

LABEL: 0xB46
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san!!」

LABEL: 0xBC8
STRING: I turned around as Yukari yelled almost angrily.

LABEL: 0xC04
STRING: I stretched out my arm and tried to take her hand――

LABEL: 0xC3E
STRING: But, Tokiwa wasn't there.

LABEL: 0xC64
STRING: 「――What are you doing, Tokiwa?!」

LABEL: 0xC98
STRING: For just a few seconds, I looked back at the hallway I'd come running down.

LABEL: 0xD29
STRING: Shit...! Why hadn't she taken a single step yet?

LABEL: 0xD69
STRING: The girl in a kimono just stood there, facing the light which was sidling up to her.

LABEL: 0xE0C
STRING: 「Tokiwa!!」

LABEL: 0xE37
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san!!」

LABEL: 0xE66
STRING: 「How... beautiful.」

LABEL: 0xE8D
STRING: That was... what I think I heard.

LABEL: 0xEB9
STRING: The light was now right in front of her.

LABEL: 0xEE7
STRING: She crouched down and held out both of her hands as if trying to scoop it up.

LABEL: 0xF3B
STRING: As she caught a portion of the light and stood up, it began to cover her feet.

LABEL: 0x1006
STRING: 「It's so lovely――」

LABEL: 0x1027
STRING: Tokiwa stood there in ecstasy.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: There was something almost divine about her figure――

LABEL: 0x1083
STRING: I involuntarily stopped, captivated by her.

LABEL: 0x10BB
STRING: I almost felt like an idiot for running like I was going to die just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x1103
STRING: I gazed at her, clothed in her green robes...

LABEL: 0x112B
STRING: Deep green, or maybe――

LABEL: 0x115C
STRING: 「Hurry up and run!」

LABEL: 0x11E0
STRING: Tokiwa was being enveloped in light as I watched.

LABEL: 0x120E
STRING: It mercilessly attacked the girl, who was standing stock-still and helpless.

LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: This wasn't God and her servants.

LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: ――It was a predator and its sacrifice.

LABEL: 0x12AA
STRING: 「Tokiwa!!」

LABEL: 0x1353
STRING: Tokiwa looked back with a carefree breath.

LABEL: 0x1381
STRING: I met her glazed-over eyes.

LABEL: 0x13A9
STRING: Illuminated by a dim light, her expression was uncertain.

LABEL: 0x13EB
STRING: Stop daydreaming already!

LABEL: 0x155B
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!!」

LABEL: 0x157E
STRING: 「Right!」

LABEL: 0x1596
STRING: I dashed off again and soon caught up to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x15CE
STRING: I offered Reiri to her from my arms.

LABEL: 0x15FA
STRING: Even though Yukari was small, even she should be able to carry Reiri with her, who was more like a dead branch.

LABEL: 0x1648
STRING: 「Take care of her.」

LABEL: 0x167E
STRING: After saying that, I turned around and headed for Tokiwa――――

LABEL: 0x1742
STRING: ――And at that moment...

LABEL: 0x1762
STRING: Unable to even break into a run, I toppled over.

LABEL: 0x17A0
STRING: I tried to stand up, but was held by my collar and was unable to move.

LABEL: 0x17E8
STRING: Was it Yukari doing this?!

LABEL: 0x1861
STRING: 「What are you doing?! We have to hurry!」

LABEL: 0x18A6
STRING: 「Don't do anything selfish.」

LABEL: 0x18D7
STRING: 「There's no time for arguing right now!」

LABEL: 0x191D
STRING: 「There's no way to save Tokiwa unless I go! If I have to take responsibility for it, then so be it!」

LABEL: 0x197E
STRING: 「And I'm saying that's selfish.」

LABEL: 0x19AE
STRING: 「We can't afford to lose you, too.」

LABEL: 0x19FF
STRING: What was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x1A1D
STRING: Was Yukari saying that she was abandoning Tokiwa so she wouldn't lose me?

LABEL: 0x1A59
STRING: Right now, she was being enveloped in that mysterious light.

LABEL: 0x1A9B
STRING: There might still be enough time to save her.

LABEL: 0x1B43
STRING: 「Do you understand? Then, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x1B76
STRING: 「...No. I can't leave her to die.」

LABEL: 0x1BA6
STRING: Who did she think it was thanks to that we'd come this far?

LABEL: 0x1BF2
STRING: I couldn't tell you how many times her knowledge and wisdom had helped us.

LABEL: 0x1C38
STRING: Could you tell me you weren't encouraged by her cheerfulness in the depths of this darkness even once?

LABEL: 0x1C8A
STRING: She was like a deep-sea fish living in a deep, dark, and unreachable temple.

LABEL: 0x1CD6
STRING: There was no way I was going to leave her behind.

LABEL: 0x1D8E
STRING: 「...Come on!」

LABEL: 0x1DBB
STRING: 「I can't!」

LABEL: 0x1E82
STRING: I felt her stomping on the base of my shoulder a moment later.

LABEL: 0x1EB6
STRING: 「Guaaah!」

LABEL: 0x1F3E
STRING: 「This isn't the time to act like a spoiled child!」

LABEL: 0x1F85
STRING: Her eyes were burning.

LABEL: 0x1FA7
STRING: And her face, colored with grief.

LABEL: 0x203B
STRING: 「You have a responsibility.」

LABEL: 0x2061
STRING: 「A responsibility to get as many people as possible out of here alive!」

LABEL: 0x20A4
STRING: As many people as possible――

LABEL: 0x20BE
STRING: 「Are you telling me we should abandon her?!」

LABEL: 0x2109
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x215C
STRING: The moment I was caught off guard, she pulled me along, body and all.

LABEL: 0x21A4
STRING: Half dragged along by Yukari, I followed her.

LABEL: 0x21E4
STRING: What a display of strength. She was still holding Reiri as well.

LABEL: 0x221C
STRING: Did ROMLES train its staff in martial arts?

LABEL: 0x2254
STRING: We went through the bridge and reached the staircase.

LABEL: 0x235B
STRING: 「You can stand on your own, can't you?」

LABEL: 0x2384
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x239E
STRING: I sluggishly got up as I replied to her.

LABEL: 0x23DC
STRING: Yukari sighed.

LABEL: 0x23FA
STRING: This made me feel like a sulking middle schooler.

LABEL: 0x2432
STRING: ...I knew in my head that it wasn't going to work, but I just couldn't get my thoughts straight.

LABEL: 0x248A
STRING: But, still...

LABEL: 0x24B8
STRING: Going over the events in my head made me hate how pathetic I was.

LABEL: 0x251D
STRING: 「...It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x253D
STRING: 「I'll... do something about Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x2574
STRING: Yukari tried to appease me.

LABEL: 0x2596
STRING: I nodded, unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x25D5
STRING: 「Please take care of Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x2602
STRING: With that, I carried the girl on my back and climbed the stairs.

LABEL: 0x269B
STRING: Only the sound of our own footsteps echoed hollowly in the quiet passageway.

LABEL: 0x26D7
STRING: It was as if everyone but the three of us had vanished from this world.

LABEL: 0x2719
STRING: How different would this be from a world in which all human beings had perished?

LABEL: 0x2767
STRING: Suddenly, I felt a breath in my ear. When I tilted my head back, Reiri brought her mouth close to my ear.

LABEL: 0x27C2
STRING: 「...You're always doing unnecessary things, you know that?」

LABEL: 0x27FB
STRING: A moment later, regret filled my mind.

LABEL: 0x2823
STRING: I shook my head to drive it out.

LABEL: 0x2853
STRING: You're wrong.

LABEL: 0x2867
STRING: I didn't mean it.

LABEL: 0x2883
STRING: It was just my imagination.

LABEL: 0x289D
STRING: I shouldn't think about such things, and even if I did, it wouldn't help now.

LABEL: 0x28E7
STRING: And besides, in the first place, that was...

LABEL: 0x2911
STRING: The more I thought about it, the more this punishing regret stuck to my mind, and wouldn't let go.

LABEL: 0x2975
STRING: ――Why?

LABEL: 0x29EE
STRING: Why had I taken Reiri's hand?

LABEL: 0x2D2F
STRING: I had abandoned Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x2D59
STRING: The silent hallway was seeped in regret.

LABEL: 0x2D8B
STRING: Even after climbing the stairs and putting Reiri down, the weight on my back didn't disappear.

LABEL: 0x2E44
STRING: At that moment, she had looked at me.

LABEL: 0x2E70
STRING: Our eyes met, and her eyes had shone like a child with a new toy.

LABEL: 0x2EC2
STRING: Curiosity, anticipation, and longing for the unknown.

LABEL: 0x2EEE
STRING: She didn't know.

LABEL: 0x2F10
STRING: That the world was not always on her side.

LABEL: 0x2F4C
STRING: It was youth and childishness.

LABEL: 0x3012
STRING: In the blink of an eye, she was engulfed in light.

LABEL: 0x304A
STRING: Even she, the embodiment of rowdiness and annoyance, had lost her voice in shock.

LABEL: 0x309A
STRING: And, I could do nothing but watch.

LABEL: 0x30D0
STRING: I had done nothing.

LABEL: 0x30EE
STRING: Even now, I was here without being able to do anything.

LABEL: 0x311A
STRING: I couldn't think about anything.

LABEL: 0x31AE
STRING: I just moved my feet, staring blankly at Yukari's small back in front of me.

LABEL: 0x31FA
STRING: And before long, she came to a stop.

LABEL: 0x32E7
STRING: We arrived at the crew room.

LABEL: 0x3305
STRING: I raised my head, then looked down at the floor again.

LABEL: 0x3331
STRING: A girl was lying face-down on the floor.

LABEL: 0x3359
STRING: She didn't move at all.

LABEL: 0x339D
STRING: She was unconscious.

LABEL: 0x33BB
STRING: Almost like a dead body――

LABEL: 0x33E6
STRING: 「Touri-san...」

LABEL: 0x3432
STRING: Reiri silently took a step forward, rubbing her feet against the floor.

LABEL: 0x34D5
STRING: She looked down at her own sister with cold, emotionless eyes.

LABEL: 0x3515
STRING: Just a few moments ago, Reiri had looked like a corpse, and Touri had been full of energy.

LABEL: 0x3567
STRING: Now, everything was reversed.

LABEL: 0x358F
STRING: I felt a sense of inversion and discomfort.

LABEL: 0x35B3
STRING: Neither of them said a thing.

LABEL: 0x369C
STRING: Reiri suddenly kicked the prone Touri on the head.

LABEL: 0x36DC
STRING: Yukari raised her voice in a panic, unable to form proper words.

LABEL: 0x3714
STRING: Reiri didn't seem the least bit bothered by her sharp cry.

LABEL: 0x375F
STRING: 「No matter how thick-skinned you are, I didn't think you had an interest in sleeping on the floor.」

LABEL: 0x37CC
STRING: 「Fnyah...」

LABEL: 0x37F7
STRING: 「You look like a corpse.」

LABEL: 0x387A
STRING: 「...Are you doing this to spite me?」

LABEL: 0x38C3
STRING: As she spoke, Reiri ground her feet against the side of Touri's face, who showed no sign of waking up.

LABEL: 0x390F
STRING: The movement of her foot distorted her innocent sleeping face.

LABEL: 0x39B5
STRING: 「H-Hey, Reiri-san! What are you doing?!」

LABEL: 0x3A02
STRING: Finally catching up to the situation, Yukari shouted at Reiri and her unexpected behavior.

LABEL: 0x3AB2
STRING: 「Ah, geez!」

LABEL: 0x3B2B
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, please say something!」

LABEL: 0x3B60
STRING: 「U-Um, sure...」

LABEL: 0x3B7E
STRING: Yukari tugged on my sleeve, bringing me back to my senses.

LABEL: 0x3BA6
STRING: Whether my mind had caught up to the situation was a different matter.

LABEL: 0x3BE2
STRING: While I was still caught up with how we'd just left Tokiwa behind,

LABEL: 0x3C20
STRING: the sudden violence taking place before me felt surreal.

LABEL: 0x3CCE
STRING: 「Do you have something to say, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x3D09
STRING: 「Well, you see...」

LABEL: 0x3D95
STRING: 「I'm just kidding.」

LABEL: 0x3DCC
STRING: Reiri crouched down where she was, this time smacking the sleeping Touri on the cheek with the back of her hand.

LABEL: 0x3EB8
STRING: 「Huh? Reiri? And everyone else too...」

LABEL: 0x3EE6
STRING: 「Did I fall asleep?」

LABEL: 0x3F29
STRING: Touri staggered as she tried to get up from the floor in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x3F61
STRING: Yukari went to support her.

LABEL: 0x4058
STRING: 「Calm down, Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4084
STRING: 「More importantly, how are you feeling?」

LABEL: 0x417B
STRING: 「I'm fine! I'm used to sleeping on the floor!」

LABEL: 0x41B5
STRING: What the hell was that about?

LABEL: 0x41D1
STRING: Reiri snorted in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x41FD
STRING: Touri looked around, not seeming to pay any attention to Yukari or me, who were unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x42BD
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4332
STRING: 「Where's Hiragino-sensei? Oh, and Tokiwa-chan as well?」

LABEL: 0x436B
STRING: ――Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4385
STRING: She asked it innocently, unconsciously, and... indifferently.

LABEL: 0x43B3
STRING: Her unintended remark brought the events that had just happened back to my mind.

LABEL: 0x43FD
STRING: A girl in a kimono engulfed in light.

LABEL: 0x445B
STRING: I averted my eyes so that Touri, who was looking around for clues, would not see or suspect me.

LABEL: 0x44BB
STRING: How could I explain to her what had just occurred―that was all I could think about.

LABEL: 0x4509
STRING: However, Yukari was already way ahead of me.

LABEL: 0x45B7
STRING: 「That's right... We need to go to Hiragino-sensei――」

LABEL: 0x45EB
STRING: 「...And fast.」

LABEL: 0x460A
STRING: She looked up in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x4634
STRING: She was right. We weren't in the clear yet.

LABEL: 0x465A
STRING: Now that that light was inside the ship, there was no telling when someone would end up like Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x46FF
STRING: Yukari and I met eyes.

LABEL: 0x472A
STRING: 「――I'll go.」

LABEL: 0x4751
STRING: 「No. You can't go alone.」

LABEL: 0x4788
STRING: 「We can't leave these two behind and wander around outside by ourselves.」

LABEL: 0x47D1
STRING: 「Then I'll――」

LABEL: 0x4802
STRING: 「With all due respect, I can't leave it to you right now.」

LABEL: 0x4882
STRING: 「I'll come back here with Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x48CF
STRING: Saying that, Yukari dashed out of the crew room.

LABEL: 0x4907
STRING: Once her back was out of sight, I turned back to the room.

LABEL: 0x4A05
STRING: The three of us were left behind.

LABEL: 0x4A24
STRING: Touri still didn't seem to understand what was going on.

LABEL: 0x4A61
STRING: 「Hey... What's up with Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x4A9E
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x4AC7
STRING: 「She said she was going to get Hiragino-sensei, but what about Tokiwa-chan?」

LABEL: 0x4B3B
STRING: 「Weren't... we supposed to be able to escape?」

LABEL: 0x4B78
STRING: Touri showered me with questions in a clumsy tone.

LABEL: 0x4BAC
STRING: But I couldn't answer any of them.

LABEL: 0x4BE2
STRING: There was no way I could answer them.

LABEL: 0x4C4C
STRING: No matter how carefully I chose my words,

LABEL: 0x4C74
STRING: the immutable truth was burned to my retinas.

LABEL: 0x4CAC
STRING: Unable to bear it any longer, I looked down at my feet.

LABEL: 0x4CED
STRING: 「Why are you so quiet, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x4D79
STRING: The girl who had stayed silent as if she was annoyed until now, suddenly spoke up.

LABEL: 0x4E3B
STRING: 「Aren't you taking a bit too long thinking about it?」

LABEL: 0x4E5D
STRING: 「Are you going to lie and run away again?」

LABEL: 0x4E8C
STRING: Her words were sharp.

LABEL: 0x4EA4
STRING: Her voice was trembling.

LABEL: 0x4EBC
STRING: And then, that trembling eventually turned into laughter.

LABEL: 0x4F1B
STRING: 「Ha ha ha ha...」

LABEL: 0x4F3E
STRING: It was a hoarse and guttural sound.

LABEL: 0x4F66
STRING: When I looked up to see if she was crying, Reiri's face was contorted to a painful-looking smile.

LABEL: 0x5087
STRING: 「Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x50A8
STRING: Touri was stunned.

LABEL: 0x50C6
STRING: Why was Reiri laughing?

LABEL: 0x50F4
STRING: We had just lost Tokiwa... Had she finally gone mad?

LABEL: 0x513A
STRING: Reiri caught her breath and began to speak, as the two of us were at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x51F4
STRING: 「I don't blame you, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x5226
STRING: 「It can't be helped, so I'll explain it to her.」

LABEL: 0x526B
STRING: Reiri looked over to me with mean eyes, grinning.

LABEL: 0x52A5
STRING: She then closed her eyes for a moment before facing her sister with a sincere look.

LABEL: 0x5300
STRING: 「Nee-san, listen carefully.」

LABEL: 0x5392
STRING: 「S-Sure.」

LABEL: 0x53BB
STRING: 「We failed. It's hopeless.」

LABEL: 0x53ED
STRING: 「We can't get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x547D
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0x54A8
STRING: 「I know you want to ask me what I mean by that. But no matter what, that is the truth.」

LABEL: 0x54FA
STRING: 「We can't get out of here――」

LABEL: 0x5539
STRING: 「Hey, Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x5557
STRING: Reiri spoke unusually cheerfully.

LABEL: 0x5587
STRING: Just what was she telling her with a smile on her face?

LABEL: 0x55CB
STRING: 「That's not it, Touri. We're fine.」

LABEL: 0x55F1
STRING: 「I'm sure we'll be able to escape, so don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x5693
STRING: 「But, Reiri said it was the truth...」

LABEL: 0x56CE
STRING: 「That's right, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x56EE
STRING: 「I'm just saying it in your stead since it seemed difficult for you to do so, but I'm not lying, am I?」

LABEL: 0x574F
STRING: 「Then choose your words better!」

LABEL: 0x577D
STRING: 「Besides, it's not like we can't get back to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x57D2
STRING: 「I wouldn't be so sure.」

LABEL: 0x57F1
STRING: 「Hey!」

LABEL: 0x5841
STRING: I shouted and grabbed Reiri by the shoulders.

LABEL: 0x586F
STRING: I could feel her bony frame through the cloth.

LABEL: 0x5899
STRING: Watching from the side, Touri stiffened even more than Reiri, whose whole body was shaking thanks to me.

LABEL: 0x5963
STRING: 「Are you still going to tell me you're going to save us all?」

LABEL: 0x5A24
STRING: 「...Even though you've already abandoned one of us.」

LABEL: 0x5A59
STRING: 「You're wrong! I didn't abandon anyone!」

LABEL: 0x5A98
STRING: 「Abandoned...?」

LABEL: 0x5AD7
STRING: I denied it immediately, but it was too late.

LABEL: 0x5B01
STRING: Reiri waved her hand in response to Touri's question.

LABEL: 0x5C1C
STRING: 「The one with the kimono.」

LABEL: 0x5C38
STRING: 「Saihouji Tokiwa. It's truly unfortunate that the scientific talent that should've led our country's future...」

LABEL: 0x5C7E
STRING: 「Is no longer in this world――」

LABEL: 0x5CC9
STRING: 「Don't be ridiculous!」

LABEL: 0x5CEF
STRING: Reiri put on a theatrical attitude.

LABEL: 0x5D15
STRING: I didn't want to be too rough with her in front of Touri, but the way she was enjoying herself was...

LABEL: 0x5DD7
STRING: 「No need to get so agitated.」

LABEL: 0x5DFC
STRING: She narrowed her eyes and glared at me mockingly.

LABEL: 0x5E47
STRING: 「No matter how you spin it, she'll not come back.」

LABEL: 0x5E91
STRING: 「Your sins will not go away.」

LABEL: 0x5EBC
STRING: 「Tokiwa is alive!」

LABEL: 0x5EE4
STRING: 「She... should be...」

LABEL: 0x5F4A
STRING: My words trailed off.

LABEL: 0x5F6C
STRING: How would Touri and Reiri take my empty words?

LABEL: 0x5FB0
STRING: ...It was true that I hadn't seen the moment of her death.

LABEL: 0x5FEC
STRING: ...There was no way she would die so easily.

LABEL: 0x60A2
STRING: 「Reiri... Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x60C8
STRING: 「What are you two talking about?」

LABEL: 0x6157
STRING: 「What happened to Tokiwa-chan!?」

LABEL: 0x6210
STRING: 「Why are you so quiet, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x623E
STRING: 「Is she really... dead?」

LABEL: 0x630B
STRING: 「Tell me the truth!」

LABEL: 0x6354
STRING: I was pushed against the wall as Touri drew near me.

LABEL: 0x6398
STRING: Her wide-open eyes were like those back when Reiri had gone missing.

LABEL: 0x63E2
STRING: Reiri simply watched her sister in amusement.

LABEL: 0x648C
STRING: 「Why aren't you saying anything?!」

LABEL: 0x64C9
STRING: 「Hey, what are you doing, Touri-san?!」

LABEL: 0x650A
STRING: A sharp voice cut in through the open door.

LABEL: 0x654E
STRING: I glanced to see Yukari out of the corner of my eye.

LABEL: 0x657C
STRING: She was lending a shoulder to the man in a white coat. Despite the sharp tone of her voice, her steps were heavy.

LABEL: 0x6629
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x66B1
STRING: 「What did you tell her?!」

LABEL: 0x66F8
STRING: 「I didn't...」

LABEL: 0x671A
STRING: I stopped myself mid-sentence.

LABEL: 0x6740
STRING: Yukari was confused as well. It was natural that she was angry at the situation before her.

LABEL: 0x6867
STRING: 「Hey.」

LABEL: 0x68AB
STRING: Hiragino, who was leaning on her shoulder almost to the point of covering her entirely, poked Yukari on the head.

LABEL: 0x6973
STRING: 「Give him a rest and calm down.」

LABEL: 0x69C0
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x69EB
STRING: 「Rather than blaming someone, shouldn't we worry about Touri-kun first?」

LABEL: 0x6AF4
STRING: He left Yukari's side even though he looked to have trouble standing up on his own,

LABEL: 0x6B3C
STRING: and walked over to Touri.

LABEL: 0x6C2F
STRING: 「Calm down.」

LABEL: 0x6CDB
STRING: 「Ah, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x6E10
STRING: 「――Wait, you're about to fall over!」

LABEL: 0x6E50
STRING: Touri came back to her senses just in time to catch Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x6E94
STRING: He hung his arm lazily around her.

LABEL: 0x6EBC
STRING: Touri was having a hard time supporting his weight.

LABEL: 0x6F62
STRING: 「Hey, Hiragino-sensei!」

LABEL: 0x6FF4
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x7017
STRING: He shook his head, trying to keep his consciousness from fading away.

LABEL: 0x7089
STRING: Leaving Touri, he staggered over to the wall, then took out a xylitol tablet from his chest pocket and spoke.

LABEL: 0x7183
STRING: 「Are you okay, Katagiri-kun? You look pale. Did something happen...?」

LABEL: 0x7248
STRING: 「I can't say I know what happened, but...」

LABEL: 0x727F
STRING: Did Yukari not tell him anything?

LABEL: 0x72A7
STRING: Hiragino glanced at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x73B9
STRING: She stayed silent.

LABEL: 0x744F
STRING: 「Good grief...」

LABEL: 0x74CA
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x74E9
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x756B
STRING: 「That argument you just had...」

LABEL: 0x75B1
STRING: 「I didn't mean to eavesdrop, but did something happen to Tokiwa-kun?」

LABEL: 0x75E4
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x7600
STRING: ...Did he hear us?

LABEL: 0x7624
STRING: He looked at me with a calm expression.

LABEL: 0x76A7
STRING: 「You know...」

LABEL: 0x7702
STRING: And at that moment...

LABEL: 0x7788
STRING: 「Do you people have no sense of urgency or crisis?」

LABEL: 0x77D4
STRING: 「You can't keep us in the dark forever.」

LABEL: 0x7842
STRING: 「"Everyone" is here.」

LABEL: 0x78CB
STRING: 「Now, I'm not a detective, but I think this is the perfect timing.」

LABEL: 0x7922
STRING: Ever since Hiragino appeared, Reiri had kept her mouth shut and watched in silence.

LABEL: 0x796A
STRING: We all stared at her as she walked over to us.

LABEL: 0x79A2
STRING: Before we knew it, she had taken the initiative.

LABEL: 0x7AAF
STRING: 「Don't you think so, Katagiri...? Or...」

LABEL: 0x7B67
STRING: 「I'll tell you.」

LABEL: 0x7B92
STRING: Yukari opened her mouth and met Reiri's gaze.

LABEL: 0x7BFC
STRING: She explained about the encounter with the man and that light, and...

LABEL: 0x7C3E
STRING: About Tokiwa, who should have been a fellow survivor... and a friend to her.

LABEL: 0x7C88
STRING: Despite the fact that she'd seen the moment she was attacked and engulfed in light right in front of her,

LABEL: 0x7CD6
STRING: she told the events like she was reading from a textbook.

LABEL: 0x7D98
STRING: 「That should be everything... If you have any questions, I'll answer them now.」

LABEL: 0x7E1A
STRING: 「...Light, huh?」

LABEL: 0x7E3B
STRING: Yukari frowned at his muttering.

LABEL: 0x7F34
STRING: 「...Do you not believe me?」

LABEL: 0x7F6B
STRING: 「I don't doubt you. But, I simply can't imagine what it was like...」

LABEL: 0x7FC5
STRING: 「Is it a living being, or...?」

LABEL: 0x8065
STRING: 「Let's hold off on talking about that for now, please...」

LABEL: 0x8097
STRING: 「I don't want to cause misunderstandings by speculating.」

LABEL: 0x8103
STRING: Those weren't Reiri's words, but I felt like I could respect, without sarcasm, the fact that Yukari could remain resolute even in this situation.

LABEL: 0x816B
STRING: The situation was grave. Hiragino nodded and turned to face me.

LABEL: 0x8215
STRING: 「What do you think?」

LABEL: 0x8242
STRING: 「I don't know. Yukari-san and I just saw that light in the darkness.」

LABEL: 0x8288
STRING: 「But... I do think it's a living being.」

LABEL: 0x82CE
STRING: 「Its behavior looked somehow ferocious and raw.」

LABEL: 0x82FC
STRING: 「And, ominous――」

LABEL: 0x8354
STRING: Yes... It had to be alive.

LABEL: 0x8380
STRING: Whether it had a will or not, I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x83D2
STRING: But, it had surrounded Tokiwa like it was evaluating her before engulfing her.

LABEL: 0x83FE
STRING: Besides――

LABEL: 0x84E3
STRING: 「Momoi, don't you know anything about it?」

LABEL: 0x853B
STRING: Her answer was the same.

LABEL: 0x8599
STRING: However, a voice came from an unexpected source just then.

LABEL: 0x8637
STRING: 「Aah, you really are useless, attendant.」

LABEL: 0x8676
STRING: 「Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x86A1
STRING: 「What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0x86DA
STRING: There was an edge to Yukari's voice as she questioned Reiri.

LABEL: 0x870A
STRING: As if she was angry or trying to get the drop on her.

LABEL: 0x87BA
STRING: 「You were there too, weren't you?」

LABEL: 0x87EE
STRING: 「We all saw that light...」

LABEL: 0x881C
STRING: 「If we assume that thing is a living being, a creature that even Tokiwa-san didn't know about, then...」

LABEL: 0x8866
STRING: 「Do you think we have more knowledge than she does?」

LABEL: 0x88B7
STRING: 「Concealing knowledge is against public interest.」

LABEL: 0x88E1
STRING: 「Hidden knowledge has its value, but don't you think it's nothing more than a crime in our current situation?」

LABEL: 0x899E
STRING: 「...I guess it's not my place to say.」

LABEL: 0x89DF
STRING: 「Conceal...?」

LABEL: 0x8A0A
STRING: 「Reiri, what are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0x8A96
STRING: Their questions remained unanswered.

LABEL: 0x8AC2
STRING: Reiri merely stared at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x8AE4
STRING: She was unreservedly looking at her

LABEL: 0x8B26
STRING: with a mocking glint in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x8B77
STRING: 「...Do you think something's funny?」

LABEL: 0x8C0F
STRING: 「Not really... I just find your honor student act unsightly.」

LABEL: 0x8C43
STRING: 「You say you want to survive? Could've fooled me.」

LABEL: 0x8C75
STRING: 「How long are you going to act so privileged?」

LABEL: 0x8D12
STRING: 「Why don't you tell us―about <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x8DD1
STRING: Yukari's face, which had maintained its composure until now, changed completely.

LABEL: 0x8E3C
STRING: 「How!?」

LABEL: 0x8E58
STRING: 「Why do you know that?!」

LABEL: 0x8E95
STRING: 「<COOS>? What the hell is that?」

LABEL: 0x8F2F
STRING: 「It's not――」

LABEL: 0x8FC3
STRING: 「Hiding information from us is the same thing as betrayal.」

LABEL: 0x909A
STRING: What was this uncomfortable feeling?

LABEL: 0x90C0
STRING: To think that Reiri would accuse Yukari so relentlessly.

LABEL: 0x90F6
STRING: I couldn't help but find it strange that she was so joyful.

LABEL: 0x919E
STRING: 「I'll answer the doctor's question.」

LABEL: 0x91CC
STRING: 「<COOS> is what that thing you saw was.」

LABEL: 0x920E
STRING: 「Or, more accurately, it's the "light" that's controlling them.」

LABEL: 0x9247
STRING: 「The light...?」

LABEL: 0x9263
STRING: So, it was a living creature, after all.

LABEL: 0x9291
STRING: ...Still, I didn't expect the light to be its main body.

LABEL: 0x92BD
STRING: Was it some kind of metaphor for a light that governed living things?

LABEL: 0x92F9
STRING: Or... Was she serious?

LABEL: 0x931B
STRING: Reiri's expression did not reveal her true intentions.

LABEL: 0x93BB
STRING: 「Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x93D5
STRING: 「Don't say anything more.」

LABEL: 0x9469
STRING: 「Why not?」

LABEL: 0x9492
STRING: 「What you're talking about right now is top-class classified information from ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x94E0
STRING: 「It's not information that can be obtained by ordinary civilians through legitimate means.」

LABEL: 0x951E
STRING: 「So, depending on how you got hold of that information, there could be a problem, right?」

LABEL: 0x9567
STRING: 「What... is that supposed to mean?」

LABEL: 0x9598
STRING: Hiragino voiced an unexpected rebuttal.

LABEL: 0x95BE
STRING: He spoke quietly, like he was lamenting something.

LABEL: 0x9674
STRING: 「Classified information from ROMLES...」

LABEL: 0x969A
STRING: 「Is that more important to you than the lives of everyone here?」

LABEL: 0x96EB
STRING: 「Are you taking her side too?」

LABEL: 0x9721
STRING: 「Or, do you just want to go against me?」

LABEL: 0x975B
STRING: 「Either way, just because we're in a situation like this... no, precisely because we're in a situation like this...」

LABEL: 0x97AD
STRING: 「We can't allow indiscipline and lawlessness――」

LABEL: 0x97FA
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if you admit it or not.」

LABEL: 0x991A
STRING: 「We're probably the only ones following the laws of the surface here at the bottom of this dark sea.」

LABEL: 0x996C
STRING: 「There are no laws here to begin with.」

LABEL: 0x99A7
STRING: 「...That's just sophistry――」

LABEL: 0x99CD
STRING: 「...You agree with me, don't you, Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0x9A69
STRING: 「...I wouldn't go that far.」

LABEL: 0x9AF4
STRING: 「I just don't want you to take everything on by yourself.」

LABEL: 0x9B2C
STRING: 「We want to think about it with you... What we should do to save ourselves.」

LABEL: 0x9B81
STRING: In contrast to Reiri's cheerful tone, Hiragino was serious.

LABEL: 0x9BFD
STRING: Yukari was at a loss over her own morals.

LABEL: 0x9C2B
STRING: As she grunted in distress, she eventually resigned herself and opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x9D3A
STRING: 「So be it. But...」

LABEL: 0x9D64
STRING: 「I can't go into detail. You must understand.」

LABEL: 0x9DAD
STRING: 「Thank you. Just tell us whatever you can.」

LABEL: 0x9DF5
STRING: 「So... Is there any information we should know that would be useful?」

LABEL: 0x9E3B
STRING: 「About <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x9ED1
STRING: 「It's dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x9EFA
STRING: Her answer was immediate.

LABEL: 0x9F14
STRING: There was no hesitation or extra remarks.

LABEL: 0x9F4A
STRING: She simply told us that it was dangerous.

LABEL: 0x9F87
STRING: 「That's... all the useful information I can tell you right now.」

LABEL: 0x9FC5
STRING: 「If there are levels of danger, it's at the top.」

LABEL: 0xA038
STRING: 「Should we refrain from acting alone from now on?」

LABEL: 0xA087
STRING: 「That would be best.」

LABEL: 0xA0E8
STRING: Once she reached an agreement with Hiragino, Yukari faced Reiri once more.

LABEL: 0xA1F5
STRING: 「The fact that you, a mere passenger, know about it is a problem.」

LABEL: 0xA245
STRING: 「I don't mean to blame you, so please tell me how you came across that information.」

LABEL: 0xA330
STRING: Withholding information was the same as betrayal...

LABEL: 0xA354
STRING: I guess you could call this payback.

LABEL: 0xA37C
STRING: However, Reiri's expression was still twisted.

LABEL: 0xA41C
STRING: 「There's a priority in the intake of information.」

LABEL: 0xA44A
STRING: 「It's foolish to think that you know everything.」

LABEL: 0xA48C
STRING: 「Why do I know about <COOS> and what do I know about it...?」

LABEL: 0xA533
STRING: 「I'll tell you as much as you want later.」

LABEL: 0xA56B
STRING: 「Isn't it more important now to figure out what to do about this situation?」

LABEL: 0xA5BE
STRING: 「――You refuse to talk?」

LABEL: 0xA5EB
STRING: A grim atmosphere settled between them.

LABEL: 0xA62C
STRING: 「Stop it already!」

LABEL: 0xA6B0
STRING: A high-pitched scream rang out.

LABEL: 0xA6CC
STRING: It was so piercing that it was hard to tell who it belonged to at first.

LABEL: 0xA710
STRING: The crooked smile disappeared from Reiri's face.

LABEL: 0xA778
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0xA7FE
STRING: 「There's a lot I don't understand about what you just said, but...」

LABEL: 0xA83E
STRING: 「Are you saying that Tokiwa-chan was attacked by that light?」

LABEL: 0xA887
STRING: I couldn't answer her.

LABEL: 0xA8A9
STRING: I just silently nodded.

LABEL: 0xA8DD
STRING: Touri ran up to me.

LABEL: 0xA8FF
STRING: This time, she wasn't just closing in on me.

LABEL: 0xA994
STRING: She pushed me against the wall and slammed her fist into my chest.

LABEL: 0xAA38
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0xAA54
STRING: 「Why didn't you save her?!」

LABEL: 0xAAAC
STRING: 「Calm down, Touri-san!」

LABEL: 0xAAD9
STRING: My airways were compressed, and my thoughts became clouded.

LABEL: 0xAB03
STRING: Why didn't I save her?

LABEL: 0xAB47
STRING: Because, I had taken your sister's hand.

LABEL: 0xABDC
STRING: Nomura Reiri――

LABEL: 0xABF6
STRING: Her eyes were reflected in my blurry vision.

LABEL: 0xAC1E
STRING: I chose her.

LABEL: 0xAC44
STRING: I ended up choosing her...

LABEL: 0xAC70
STRING: Why...

LABEL: 0xACA8
STRING: Anger began welling up inside me, as well.

LABEL: 0xADA3
STRING: 「Touri-san!」

LABEL: 0xADCE
STRING: 「I'm going to go and help her!!」

LABEL: 0xADFF
STRING: 「How? You have no idea what to do!」

LABEL: 0xAE4C
STRING: 「Now, now. She's just talking nonsense.」

LABEL: 0xAE7B
STRING: Yukari didn't lend an ear to Reiri's interruption.

LABEL: 0xAF7C
STRING: 「Were you not listening to what I just said?」

LABEL: 0xAFB0
STRING: 「<COOS> is dangerous. You can't just go out there and get killed.」

LABEL: 0xB062
STRING: 「So, you're leaving her to die?!」

LABEL: 0xB096
STRING: 「Leaving her to be killed by this unknown monster――」

LABEL: 0xB15C
STRING: 「I never said that.」

LABEL: 0xB1EC
STRING: Yukari drew closer to Touri and caressed her head.

LABEL: 0xB22C
STRING: Touri, who was bracing herself to run away at any moment, froze in place.

LABEL: 0xB278
STRING: As Touri's tense body relaxed, Yukari gently caught her in her arms.

LABEL: 0xB32A
STRING: 「Let's all come up with a plan.」
